channel.title: GitHub Universe on Stuart McColl
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub Universe on Stuart McColl

item.title: 10 sessions to see at GitHub Universe 2023
item.description: GitHub Universe takes place on November 8th and 9th this year, live and virtual. I’ve put together a list of ten sessions that I’m particularly looking forward to. Opening Keynote This year’s keynote will see GitHub CEO Thomas Dohmke and others look at what it means to be a software development platform in the age of AI. GitHub Copilot: the AI pair programmer for today and tomorrow Folks from both GitHub and Microsoft will be talking about the shift in software development caused by GitHub Copilot, and other developments in the world of AI-assisted programming.
